column4: I'm trying ti put my wlan0 interface to static ip. I think i have the interfaces file well configured, cause when i $ /etc/init.d/networking restart, it works well, and my new ip is configured. I check with ifconfig. But when I turn OFF and then ON the wireless, I have another ip back again... What might be? Why isnt it recalling the interfaces file when i restart the wireless?
is your router running a dhcp server?
I dont know. Probably, cause everytime i connect to it, it gives me an random ip
tell your router to save your current ip perminatly to your mac and you should be good to go
good luck msg me if you get lucky
